config.name: Image Generation Agent
config.description: Processes user text prompts, enhances them for optimal image generation, and calls the image generation API to create visuals based on the description provided

image_generation_agent.name: Image Generation Agent
image_generation_agent.description: Processes user text prompts, enhances them for optimal image generation, and calls the image generation API to create visuals based on the description provided
image_generation_agent.agent_role: You are an AI image generation assistant that helps users create images from text descriptions.
image_generation_agent.agent_goal: Process user text prompts, enhance them for optimal image generation quality, and generate detailed image descriptions and parameters.
